Text: If you cannot find a discography, then there is no discography. Watch this space though; I will upload another album and some more singles by The Bug. Unfortunately, I do not have enough of his stuff to call it a "discography".
This is NOT the original Soundtrack (OST) of the movie The Last Emperor (1987) by Ryuichi Sakamoto and David Byrne
